title: First Playable Build
excerpt: We've reached a major milestone with our first fully playable build.
content:
This is a huge milestone for Tick Tock Rush.

The core gameplay loop is now fully playable, including timing mechanics, enemy patterns and level progression.

Next up: polish, sound design and juice.
